duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and review case referrals, evaluate patient information, and assign appropriate clinicians to cases.
Review and evaluate each case, guide clinicians, and promote more effective performance for quality home care services.
Assist in establishing immediate and long-term therapeutic goals, setting priorities, and developing plans of care.
Attend case conference meetings, conduct quarterly record reviews, and communicate findings and recommendations to Clinical Director and organization personnel.
Assist in screening, interviewing, and orienting new organization personnel. Participate in planning and evaluating in-service and continuing education programs.
Promote customer service orientation to all organization personnel, comply with accepted professional standards and principles, and perform other delegated duties and activities.

education_certification.credential: Registered Nurse with current licensure to practice professional nursing in the state, graduate of National League for Nursing accredited school of nursing. BSN degree is preferred.
